TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Предоставляет данные для события изменения фокуса.

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
The child [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `idObject` И `idChild` параметры содержат [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] идентификаторы, используемые клиентами автоматизации пользовательского интерфейса для связывания объекта для `IAccessible` объекта в более старые приложения специальных возможностей.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

summary.span: Получает дочерний идентификатор [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] объекта, который получает фокус.

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Объект [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] являются 32-разрядного значения, определяющие категории доступных объектов в приложении.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject` И `idChild` параметры содержат объект [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] , клиенты могут использовать для связывания для `IAccessible` объекта в более старые приложения специальных возможностей.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: Возможные значения см. в разделе [идентификаторы объектов](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) в документации по Microsoft Active Accessibility.

span.span: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Объект [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] являются 32-разрядного значения, определяющие категории доступных объектов в приложении.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject` И `idChild` параметры содержат объект [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] , клиенты могут использовать для связывания для `IAccessible` объекта в более старые приложения специальных возможностей.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
